/* Name: select_activity_status Purpose: computes the activity status (a Color, actually) given a state and a comparision value, by searching the Preference and related tables. Created: 1-DEC-2005 George J. Carrette */ CREATE FUNCTION innovator.Select_activity_status(@STATE VARCHAR(64), @VALUE INTEGER) RETURNS VARCHAR(64) AS BEGIN DECLARE @MAX_INTEGER INTEGER
SET @MAX_INTEGER = 2147483647
DECLARE @COLOR VARCHAR(64) DECLARE @COLORMAP_ID CHAR(32) DECLARE @LEAST_UPPER_BOUND INTEGER
SET @COLOR = '#000001' SET @COLORMAP_ID = (SELECT value FROM INNOVATOR.Select_pm_projectcolormap_id(@STATE))
IF @COLORMAP_ID IS NULL RETURN @COLOR
SET @LEAST_UPPER_BOUND = (SELECT Min(Isnull(COMPARISON_VALUE, @MAX_INTEGER)) FROM PM_ProjectColorPeriod WHERE SOURCE_ID = @COLORMAP_ID AND Isnull(COMPARISON_VALUE, @MAX_INTEGER) >= Isnull(@VALUE, @MAX_INTEGER - 1)) SET @COLOR = '#000002'
IF @LEAST_UPPER_BOUND IS NULL RETURN @COLOR
SET @COLOR = (SELECT COLOR FROM PM_ProjectColorPeriod WHERE SOURCE_ID = @COLORMAP_ID AND Isnull(COMPARISON_VALUE, @MAX_INTEGER) = @LEAST_UPPER_BOUND)
RETURN @COLOR END
